messages.content:
Dear Resident,

Around a quarter of people will suffer from a mental health issue this year. That’s over 20,000 people just in Sheffield Hallam.

And yet, there is still a chronic imbalance at the heart of the NHS: the way in which we treat people with physical illnesses and those who need mental health support.

That’s why I'm incredibly proud that the Liberal Democrats have committed to ensuring mental health support is available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.

I know the difference this will make to the lives of so many here in Sheffield.

Everyone knows the Conservatives can’t be trusted with our NHS. But, if you elect me, I will always speak up for our NHS – just like I did when I led the campaign to save the NHS Walk-in Centre and Minor Injuries Unit which so many people rely on.

The Liberal Democrats’ carefully costed plan will invest in the NHS across Britain. It will start to tackle the problems we hear about every week. We will cut waiting times in our NHS, increase access to mental health support and ensure it’s properly funded.

That’s why I need your support on Thursday 12th December – so you get an MP helping to build a brighter future for Sheffield Hallam and to tackle the injustice of mental health care provision.

Best Wishes,
Laura Gordon

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will cut waiting times, increase access to mental health support, and ensure the NHS is properly funded.
